adrFormatAddress: 121 Greene St, New York, NY 10012, USA

originalText.text: Fantastic shopping experience and amazing collection! In particular, Ashley Marie has gone above and beyond helping me find amazing new pieces for my wardrobe this season that fit my needs and style. Each time I visit, the team is welcoming, authentic, and thoughtful. Thank you for making shopping fun for me, esp. as at other stores / online it's typically overwhelming and not my favorite activity!

originalText.text: Probably one of my all-time favorite shopping experiences. I was visiting out of town and this is the only proenza location in the world so I was really excited to visit. I had an amazing time chatting with all of the stores associates who are very kind and welcoming.  The staff is very knowledgeable about new in season pieces along with last season pieces and they also had a 60% off sale going on when I visited. When making a decision on which piece I should get the associates help me figure out how I can style the piece for any given weather and help me make an informed decision. Not once did I feel pressured to buy something. They also were able to total everything up for me so I can see what keeping a certain piece would add to the total cost. I already knew I loved proenza from their quality clothes and impeccable tailoring but I have a newfound respect for them after visiting their location and having such a positive experience. Thank you!

originalText.text: Amazing shopping experience and very helpful staff. I am a fan of Ashley Marie who has impeccable taste and is ever so helpful and made the experience worth the trip. So glad i went to the store!

text.text: Amazing shopping experience and very helpful staff. I am a fan of Ashley Marie who has impeccable taste and is ever so helpful and made the experience worth the trip. So glad i went to the store!

originalText.text: Run do not walk after from this boutique. I bought two dresses on line at this store. They refused the return stating there was a snag inside the dress. Since I never tried the dress on I complained to my credit card company and they refunded my money. Stupidly I shopped here again recently Donovan helped me. I tried on two dresses and told him I couldn’t decide which I wanted to wear to an upcoming event so I would take both and decide. I asked about return and he  told me 10 days. When I bought the 1600 dress back I was told it was only for store credit. When Donovan handed me my receipt he folded it in three so I couldn’t see the fine print. When I complained they basically said tough luck. A really  horrible and dishonest store. Go to Barney or Bergdoff for your Prozenza Schouler purchase!!

originalText.text:
Walked in their with my wife and my 1 year old on a stroller.  Was a windy day and we were a mess.
I found it funny that the staff paid us no attention at all cause we weren't dressed like we were in there to buy a 1900$ bag.
Told us to go downstairs where the bag was and take a look.  The sales associate actually started helping a customer that walked in behind us, who was dressed more like someone who would buy.
we waited for about 20minutes then the associate came.   Told her we wanted to see some bags.  She said she will get them and then disappeared for another 10mins.   Finally another staff member working the back room brought out the bags,  I asked her if she had the PS1 ask in gold hardware, she said yes.  I said we will take it and then she started being friendly and accommodating.  SMH...
